location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident, dated 22 June 1819, regarding the boat recently captured by HM Sloop Curlew. In response to a claim being made by Shaikh Mohumed ben Qunzsab, Governor of Singuah, it is stated that the Government requires additional information before it can issue instructions.
